mapper.select: SELECT a.FK_USER, a.FK_ROLE, b.USER_NAME, b.USER_SN, b.USER_PHONE, b.USER_SEX, a.IS_USE FROM SC_USER_SHOP a LEFT JOIN SC_USER b ON a.FK_USER = b.USER_PK WHERE a.FK_SHOP = #{FK_SHOP} AND a.FK_ROLE != '1' AND a.FK_ROLE != '2' AND a.FK_ROLE != '7' ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC

SELECT a.FK_USER, a.FK_ROLE, CONVERT(a.IS_USE, SIGNED) as IS_USE, a.USER_DESC, b.USER_NAME, b.USER_SN, b.USER_PHONE, b.USER_SEX FROM SC_USER_SHOP a LEFT JOIN SC_USER b ON a.FK_USER = b.USER_PK WHERE a.FK_SHOP = #{FK_SHOP} AND a.FK_USER = #{FK_USER} AND a.FK_ROLE != '1' AND a.FK_ROLE != '2' AND a.FK_ROLE != '7' ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO sc_user_shop ( USER_SHOP_ID, FK_USER, FK_ROLE, FK_USER_TAG, FK_SHOP, INSERT_TIME ) VALUES ( #{UUID}, #{USER_ID}, #{ROLE_ID},
(SELECT USER_TAG_ID FROM sc_user_tag WHERE USER_TAG_NAME = #{tagName} AND FK_APP = #{FK_APP}), #{SHOP_ID}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE SC_USER_SHOP SET FK_ROLE = #{FK_ROLE}, USER_DESC = #{USER_DESC}, IS_USE = #{IS_USE} WHERE FK_USER = #{FK_USER} AND FK_SHOP = #{FK_SHOP}
UPDATE SC_USER SET USER_NAME = #{USER_NAME}, USER_PHONE = #{USER_PHONE} WHERE USER_PK = #{FK_USER}
